(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (NNS Thanks))
    (PP (TO to)
      (NP (PDT all) (DT the) (NNS participants)
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WP who))
          (S
            (VP (VBD came)
              (PP (TO to)
                (NP (DT the) (NNP Photography) (NN workshop))))))))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, Thanks-1)
prep(Thanks-1, to-2)
predet(participants-5, all-3)
det(participants-5, the-4)
pobj(to-2, participants-5)
nsubj(came-7, who-6)
ccomp(participants-5, came-7)
prep(came-7, to-8)
det(workshop-11, the-9)
nn(workshop-11, Photography-10)
pobj(to-8, workshop-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP think)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP we))
          (ADVP (DT all))
          (VP (VBD managed)
            (VP (VB pick)
              (PRT (RP up))
              (NP
                (NP (DT some) (NNS tips))
                (FRAG
                  (CONJP (RB as) (RB well) (IN as))
                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB eat)
                        (NP (DT some)
                          (ADJP (RB quite) (JJ unique))
                          (NNP Dim) (NN Sum))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(think-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, think-2)
nsubj(managed-5, we-3)
advmod(managed-5, all-4)
ccomp(think-2, managed-5)
xcomp(managed-5, pick-6)
prt(pick-6, up-7)
det(tips-9, some-8)
dobj(pick-6, tips-9)
advmod(well-11, as-10)
cc(eat-14, well-11)
mwe(well-11, as-12)
aux(eat-14, to-13)
dep(tips-9, eat-14)
det(Sum-19, some-15)
advmod(unique-17, quite-16)
amod(Sum-19, unique-17)
nn(Sum-19, Dim-18)
dobj(eat-14, Sum-19)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This) (JJ particular) (NN workshop))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (ADJP (RB slightly) (JJ different))
      (SBAR (IN as)
        (S
          (NP (PRP$ our) (NNS participants))
          (VP (VBD were)
            (ADVP (RB also))
            (VP (VBN given)
              (NP (DT the) (NN opportunity)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB practice)
                      (NP (PRP$ their) (NN photography) (NNS skills))
                      (PP (IN in)
                        (S
                          (VP (VBG taking)
                            (NP
                              (NP
                                (NP (NNS photos))
                                (PP (IN of)
                                  (NP (NNS people))))
                              (CONJP (RB as) (RB well) (IN as))
                              (NP (NN food)))))))))))))))
    (, ,)))


det(workshop-3, This-1)
amod(workshop-3, particular-2)
nsubj(different-6, workshop-3)
cop(different-6, was-4)
advmod(different-6, slightly-5)
root(ROOT-0, different-6)
mark(given-12, as-7)
poss(participants-9, our-8)
nsubjpass(given-12, participants-9)
auxpass(given-12, were-10)
advmod(given-12, also-11)
advcl(different-6, given-12)
det(opportunity-14, the-13)
dobj(given-12, opportunity-14)
aux(practice-16, to-15)
infmod(opportunity-14, practice-16)
poss(skills-19, their-17)
nn(skills-19, photography-18)
dobj(practice-16, skills-19)
prep(practice-16, in-20)
pcomp(in-20, taking-21)
dobj(taking-21, photos-22)
prep(photos-22, of-23)
pobj(of-23, people-24)
advmod(well-26, as-25)
cc(photos-22, well-26)
mwe(well-26, as-27)
conj(photos-22, food-28)


(ROOT
  (S (RB not)
    (VP (TO to)
      (VP (VB mention)
        (NP (NN landscape) (NNS photos))
        (SBAR (IN since)
          (S
            (NP (PRP we))
            (VP (VBD were)
              (PP (IN at)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (NN top))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP (NNP UOB) (NNP Plaza))))))))))
    (. .)))


neg(mention-3, not-1)
aux(mention-3, to-2)
root(ROOT-0, mention-3)
nn(photos-5, landscape-4)
dobj(mention-3, photos-5)
mark(were-8, since-6)
nsubj(were-8, we-7)
advcl(mention-3, were-8)
prep(were-8, at-9)
det(top-11, the-10)
pobj(at-9, top-11)
prep(top-11, of-12)
nn(Plaza-14, UOB-13)
pobj(of-12, Plaza-14)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN As)
      (ADVP (RB always)))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, As-1)
pcomp(As-1, always-2)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP we))
    (VP (VBD held)
      (NP (DT a) (NN competition))
      (PP (IN at)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN end))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (DT the) (NN workshop)))))
      (SBAR (IN in) (NN order)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB let)
              (NP (PRP$ our) (NNS participants))
              (S
                (VP (VBG showcase)
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT some))
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (NP (PRP$ their) (NN work)))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(held-2, we-1)
root(ROOT-0, held-2)
det(competition-4, a-3)
dobj(held-2, competition-4)
prep(held-2, at-5)
det(end-7, the-6)
pobj(at-5, end-7)
prep(end-7, of-8)
det(workshop-10, the-9)
pobj(of-8, workshop-10)
mark(let-14, in-11)
dep(let-14, order-12)
aux(let-14, to-13)
advcl(held-2, let-14)
poss(participants-16, our-15)
dobj(let-14, participants-16)
xcomp(let-14, showcase-17)
dobj(showcase-17, some-18)
prep(some-18, of-19)
poss(work-21, their-20)
pobj(of-19, work-21)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (RB Here))
    (ADVP (RB then))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NNS winners))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (DT the) (NN competition)))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(winners-5, Here-1)
advmod(winners-5, then-2)
cop(winners-5, are-3)
det(winners-5, the-4)
root(ROOT-0, winners-5)
prep(winners-5, of-6)
det(competition-8, the-7)
pobj(of-6, competition-8)
